alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dane; Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Green Lake; Jefferson; Rock; Walworth; Washington; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 9:58PM CST by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Green Lake, southern Fond du Lac, Walworth, Rock, eastern Columbia, western Waukesha, eastern Dane, western Washington, Jefferson and Dodge Counties through 1045 PM CST... At 957 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Randolph to Columbus to Deerfield to near Orfordville. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail at times. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastern Madison, Janesville, Beloit, Sun Prairie, Watertown, Beaver Dam, Whitewater, Hartford, Pewaukee, Stoughton, Fort Atkinson, Waupun, Elkhorn, Hartland, Delavan, Jefferson, McFarland, Lake Geneva, Mukwonago and Delafield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for south central and southeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Dane; Dodge; Fond Du Lac; Green Lake; Jefferson; Rock; Walworth; Washington; Waukesha
